name: Pokini Kagura
description:
want to make a stylish action game with wildly expressive movement (a.k.a. shmovement). This is my initial test to explore the core movement mechanics.

If you like this project and want to see more of it: consider supporting me on Fanbox, Patreon, or simply following me on Twitter.

Combat abilities are only vaguely roughed out at the moment, so don't expect much there (yet).

Lots of known minor visual bugs, but nothing game breaking as far as I know. Please report any issues you encounter.

Track: Netrum & Halvorsen - Phoenix [NCS10 Release]
Music provided by NoCopyrightSounds.
